name: Icewall
storyline:
“No one knew where the construct came from, one day it just suddenly appeared. A glowing cube floating in cyberspace, with big letters on its side reading: ICEwall.

The construct seemingly had no purpose and yet it contained a series of programs, ICE, designed to eliminate intruders, as if its sole purpose was to challenge us.

The other runners and I were instantly hooked, like kids spending all their money playing arcade machines.”

- ROTN, Console Cowboy
summary: Icewall is a game that combines retro shoot'em up and modern roguelite game design. It features intense, colorful and fast-paced gameplay, the roguelite run-based structure enhances the game with strategy and replay-value as you draft new strategies and combos.
